title: Jubilant FoodWorks plans to fully buy DP Eurasia in Rs 670-cr deal
description: Jubilant FoodWorks Ltd (JFL), the operator of Dominoâ€™s Pizza and Dunkin Donuts, intends to acquire an additional 51.16% stake in DP Eurasia NV, the exclusive master franchisee of Domino's Pizza in Turkey, Azerbaijan, and Georgia. The acquisition, valued at EUR 73.36 million (Rs 670 crore), will be executed through a subsidiary. Currently, JFL's wholly-owned arm, Jubilant FoodWorks Netherlands B.V, holds 48.84% of DP Eurasia's ordinary shares
